text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump God bless you Mr. President. You’re working this Covid19 problem 24/7. Make sure you’re getting some rest sir. Take care of yourself. Millions of us love you and your family and we know you’re doing everything you can to slow the spread and bring our economy back. We love you.❤️
